description: Preparatory assistance for programme of support to the Human Development Report in South Africa 2008-2010

subproject.description: UNDP will provide advocacy, technical and coordination support to the Human Development Report for South Africa for 2008-2010. The focus of the HDR is on assessing capacities for civic engagement, at local levels, with a view to enhancing participatory governance for improved service delivery. The 2008/10 report will engender broad-based strategic conversations among stakeholders, to promote solutions-based analyses of the dynamics that contribute to the current service delivery challenges. The project will include a desk research exercise that will support data from the dialogue process and report on outcomes.

title: Preparatory Assistance for programme Support to HDR
